title: doc/contribute: codereview extension could use a documentation header
body:
by **patrick.allen.higgins**: 
I didn't discover the "hg help codereview" command in the documentation when
looking for something like it because it is in the "Configure the extension"
heading after obvious configuration information. Adding a separate "Understanding
the extension" header with that information would make it easier to find.

Also, a note that e.g. "hg help change" will show documentation would be
helpful, too.
